tournament.name: Torneio do Weber - Tix Pro Top 8

decks.notes: This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing efficient creatures like Goblin Tomb Raider and Voldaren Epicure, alongside removal spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, the deck aims to chip away at the opponent's life total while maintaining board control. Faithless Looting and Deadly Dispute help with card selection and resource management, while cards like Alms of the Vein provide additional reach. The deck's mana base consists of artifact lands and utility lands to ensure smooth casting of spells.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total by playing aggressive creatures and damaging spells. Mono Black Aggro emphasizes on using low-cost creatures and removal spells to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. By efficiently using mana and maximizing damage output, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize or gain control. Additionally, the deck includes card draw spells and lifegain effects to maintain card advantage and sustain its aggressive game plan.

The main focus of this Orzhov Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently control the board while applying pressure to the opponent. By utilizing efficient removal spells like Cast Down and Unmake, along with aggressive creatures like Glint Hawk and Kor Skyfisher, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and win through combat damage. The deck also includes card advantage and lifegain elements to ensure longevity in the game. Overall, the deck aims to outpace and outvalue the opponent in order to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to create a powerful synergy between sacrificing Goblins, generating mana, and drawing cards to fuel a combo win condition. By utilizing cards like Skirk Prospector, Putrid Goblin, and Deadly Dispute, the deck aims to create a loop of sacrificing and reanimating Goblins while generating mana and card advantage. With cards like Mesmeric Fiend and Dark-Dweller Oracle to disrupt the opponent's strategy, this combo-centric Goblin deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of sacrifices and explosive plays.

The deck focuses on using flicker effects to repeatedly trigger enter-the-battlefield effects of creatures like Augur of Bolas and Mulldrifter, generating card advantage and value. It also utilizes counter spells and removal to control the board while setting up the combo. The synergy between flicker effects and powerful creatures allows the deck to outvalue opponents and maintain control of the game. With a mix of card draw, removal, and creature recursion, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a strong board presence and constant pressure.

The deck focuses on using walls with defender abilities to generate mana and protect yourself while assembling a combo that allows you to generate infinite mana and win the game. The key cards include Axebane Guardian and Overgrown Battlement for mana generation, along with Freed from the Real for the infinite mana combo. The deck also includes cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to help find your combo pieces quickly. With the right setup, you can overwhelm your opponent with a massive amount of mana and win the game in a single turn.

The main focus of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy by playing low-cost creatures and powering them up with enchantments. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats and buffs while also having access to protection and countermagic to disrupt the opponent's game plan. By consistently applying pressure and maintaining a strong board presence, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.
